actions.name: BatchGetItem
actions.description: The BatchGetItem action returns the attributes of one or more items from one or more tables.

actions.name: BatchWriteItem
actions.description: The BatchWriteItem action operation puts or deletes multiple items in one or more tables.

actions.name: ConditionCheckItem
actions.description: The ConditionCheckItem operation checks the existence of a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key

actions.name: CreateCluster
actions.description: The CreateCluster action creates a DAX cluster.
dependentActions: dax:CreateParameterGroup                                                                                        dax:CreateSubnetGroup                                                                                        ec2:CreateNetworkInterface                                                                                        ec2:DeleteNetworkInterface                                                                                        ec2:DescribeNetworkInterfaces                                                                                        ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups                                                                                        ec2:DescribeSubnets                                                                                        ec2:DescribeVpcs                                                                                        iam:GetRole                                                                                        iam:PassRole

actions.name: CreateParameterGroup
actions.description: The CreateParameterGroup action creates collection of parameters that you apply to all of the nodes in a DAX cluster.

actions.name: CreateSubnetGroup
actions.description: The CreateSubnetGroup action creates a new subnet group.

actions.name: DecreaseReplicationFactor
actions.description: The DecreaseReplicationFactor action removes one or more nodes from a DAX cluster.

actions.name: DeleteCluster
actions.description: The DeleteCluster action deletes a previously provisioned DAX cluster.

actions.name: DeleteItem
actions.description: The DeleteItem action deletes a single item in a table by primary key.

actions.name: DeleteParameterGroup
actions.description: The DeleteParameterGroup action deletes the specified parameter group.

actions.name: DeleteSubnetGroup
actions.description: The DeleteSubnetGroup action deletes a subnet group.

actions.name: DescribeClusters
actions.description: The DescribeClusters action returns information about all provisioned DAX clusters.

actions.name: DescribeDefaultParameters
actions.description: The DescribeDefaultParameters action returns the default system parameter information for DAX.

actions.name: DescribeEvents
actions.description: The DescribeEvents action returns events related to DAX clusters and parameter groups.

actions.name: DescribeParameterGroups
actions.description: The DescribeParameterGroups action returns a list of parameter group descriptions.

actions.name: DescribeParameters
actions.description: The DescribeParameters action returns the detailed parameter list for a particular parameter group.

actions.name: DescribeSubnetGroups
actions.description: The DescribeSubnetGroups action returns a list of subnet group descriptions.

actions.name: GetItem
actions.description: The GetItem action returns a set of attributes for the item with the given primary key.

actions.name: IncreaseReplicationFactor
actions.description: The IncreaseReplicationFactor action adds one or more nodes to a DAX cluster.

actions.name: ListTags
actions.description: The ListTags action returns a list all of the tags for a DAX cluster.

actions.name: PutItem
actions.description: The PutItem action creates a new item, or replaces an old item with a new item.

actions.name: Query
actions.description: The Query action finds items based on primary key values. You can query any table or secondary index that has a composite primary key (a partition key and a sort key).

actions.name: RebootNode
actions.description: The RebootNode action reboots a single node of a DAX cluster.

actions.name: Scan
actions.description: The Scan action returns one or more items and item attributes by accessing every item in a table or a secondary index.

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: The TagResource action associates a set of tags with a DAX resource.

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: The UntagResource action removes the association of tags from a DAX resource.

actions.name: UpdateCluster
actions.description: The UpdateCluster action modifies the settings for a DAX cluster.

actions.name: UpdateItem
actions.description: The UpdateItem action edits an existing item's attributes, or adds a new item to the table if it does not already exist.

actions.name: UpdateParameterGroup
actions.description: The UpdateParameterGroup action modifies the parameters of a parameter group.

actions.name: UpdateSubnetGroup
actions.description: The UpdateSubnetGroup action modifies an existing subnet group.
